quotes.quote: The year may end, but some things never do. You may not see them with your eyes, but when you look with your heart, you can.
I donâ€™t want to change. I want to change. We all hold in our hearts conflicting feelings, each back to back. And so, we live our days.
There are times like that music can convey more than words.
There are some things you can gain by letting some things go. Happiness isn't just what you have here and now.
Even if your feelings or wishes do not come true, or if things don't go as you planned - on another road grows another flower. A new flower blooms there.
All meetings must end with partings.
Everybody loves somebody. In time, everybody falls in love with somebody. Just as I found you.
If you think music is only made of sounds, you're mistaken. Silence is also part of music.
